welcome_prompt: Welcome to RSS to Telegram Bot.
permission_denied_not_bot_manager: This command can only be used by the bot manager.
permission_denied_not_chat_admin: This command can only be used by the admins of this group/channel.
permission_denied_not_in_private_chat: This command can only be used in a private chat.
permission_denied_not_member: You are not in this group/channel, thus cannot use the bot.
permission_denied_bot_not_member: The bot is no longer in this group/channel, thus won't work here.
promote_to_admin_prompt: If you are an anonymous admin of this group, please promote the bot to an admin (no permission needed) to empower the bot to verify your identity.
group_upgrade_needed_prompt:
Oops, your group hasn't been upgraded to a supergroup. Generally, the Telegram server should automatically perform this upgrade at some time, but if not, you have to upgrade it manually before you can use the bot.
Please follow these steps:
1. Goto the group info, then click "Manage group"
2. Change "Chat history for new members" to "Visible"
3. Save chat history visibility setting
4. Save all settings
5. (Optional) If needed, you can change "Chat history for new members" to "Hidden" again
6. Now you should be able to use the bot
processing: Processing, please wait for a moment...
sub_reply_feed_url_prompt_html: Please reply the URL of an RSS feed. Or, you may use /sub url1 url2 url3 ... to subscribe in bulk.
unsub_choose_sub_prompt_html: Please choose a subscription you'd like to unsubscribe. Or, you may use /unsub url1 url2 url3 ... to unsubscribe in bulk.
send_opml_prompt: Please send me the OPML file to be imported (extension name must be .opml).
send_opml_reply_placeholder: The OPML file to be imported (extension name must be .opml)
opml_import_processing: If the number of feeds is large or feed servers are slow, it can be a long wait. Sit back and relax.
set_choose_sub_prompt: Please choose a subscription you'd like to customize.
feed_deactivated_warn:
The monitoring task had failed for 100 consecutive times. Your subscription to the RSS feed has been deactivated.
To reactivate it, please use the /activate_subs command.
choose_sub_to_be_activated:
The subscriptions below are deactivated, choose one to activate.
After activated, their updates will be monitored.
choose_sub_to_be_deactivated:
The subscriptions below are activated, choose one to deactivate.
After deactivated, their updates will be suspended from monitoring. If you don't need the subscription any more, please consider unsubscribing it instead of deactivating it.
option_value_invalid: The Option value is invalid, please check its type
rsstt_slogan: RSS to Telegram Bot, a Telegram RSS bot that cares about your reading experience.
cmd_description_import: Import subscriptions from an OPML file
cmd_description_export: Export subscriptions to an OPML file
